DOC.brief_summary: In Spain, there is little data available concerning the evolution and treatment of Psoriatic Arthritis by rheumatologists and dermatologists. This study is designed to obtain more data about the clinical and therapeutic management of Psoriatic Arthritis in Dermatology and Rheumatology Medical centers.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Workload, Clinical and Therapeutic Management of Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.criteria: 1. patients older than 18 years with a psoriatic arthritis diagnosis that go to dermatologic and/or rheumatologic centers or primary care centers. 2. patients that receive pharmacologic treatment for their condition 3. patients that give their written consent to participate
